snippet: Kurt Busch won a wild Nationwide race at Daytona International Speedway on Friday night, holding off several Nascar challengers over the final hundred yards in a battered race car.
abstract: Kurt Busch wins a wild Nationwide race at Daytona International Speedway, holding off several Nascar challengers over the final hundred yards in a battered racecar.
lead_paragraph: Kurt Busch won a wild Nationwide race at Daytona International Speedway on Friday night, holding off several Nascar challengers over the final hundred yards in a battered race car.

headline.seo: Nascar — Kurt Busch Wins Wild Nationwide Race at Daytona
